description:
Free and open source design system with ready-to-use elements for building seamless plugins in your Strapi admin panel or to customize it to your specific needs.


Our approach follows these principles :

  • Make is consistent for everyone and anyone
  • Data informs design
  • Make the default settings smart


The components include:

  • Accordions
  • Alerts
  • Avatar
  • Badge
  • Buttons
  • Card
  • Checkboxes & Radio
  • Date & Time
  • Dialog Modals
  • Dividers
  • Empty states
  • Headers
  • Inputs
  • Menus
  • Modals
  • Navigation
  • Pagination
  • Pop Overs
  • Progress Bars
  • Search bars
  • Sidebars
  • Status
  • Table
  • Tabs
  • Tags
  • Toggle & switches


This UI kit is created based on user research with the vibrant community of contributors and users.

If you have any feedback, please contact us at design@strapi.io
